uxGuide.title: UX Guide
uxGuide.subtitle: Design system overview
uxGuide.description: Comprehensive design system documentation following atomic design principles. Single source of truth for UI development.
uxGuide.note: Internal reference: keep this page in sync with globals.css and UI components.
uxGuide.colorsHint: Use orange as the primary brand hue with clean neutrals for structure.

fontFamily.title: Outfit
fontFamily.description: Modern geometric sans-serif font with clean lines. Perfect for real estate UI.
fontFamily.specimen: Aa Bb Cc Dd Ee Ff Gg Hh Ii Jj Kk Ll Mm Nn Oo Pp Qq Rr Ss Tt Uu Vv Ww Xx Yy Zz

typographyScale.description: Consistent typography scale for hierarchical content organization.

listingCard.title: Property Listing Card
listingCard.description: Main component for displaying property listings in grid and list views.

atomicDesign.title: Component Hierarchy
atomicDesign.description: Our UI follows atomic design methodology for consistent, scalable components.

atoms.title: Atoms
atoms.description: Basic building blocks: buttons, badges, inputs, checkboxes

molecules.title: Molecules
molecules.description: Simple component groups: cards, sliders, filter sections

organisms.title: Organisms
organisms.description: Complex UI sections: listing cards, filter panels, navbar, footer

templates.title: Templates
templates.description: Page layouts: portfolio, listing detail, contact

icons.title: Lucide React Icons
icons.description: Consistent icon library with customizable size and color.
icons.usage: Import from lucide-react, use className for styling
icons.common: Building2, MapPin, BedDouble, Bath, Square, Star, Bookmark, Search, Menu

animations.title: Motion Patterns
animations.description: Subtle animations for enhanced user experience.

typography.headline: Section headline
typography.title: Card title
typography.bodyText: Readable body copy for descriptions, paragraphs, and listing details.
typography.mutedText: Muted helper text for secondary information.
typography.caption: Caption text
typography.captionText: Small captions for metadata and labels.

forms.title: Inputs & selections
forms.hint: Focus states use the brand orange for clarity.

examples.cardText: Use cards for property highlights, stats, or key features.

normalized21st.title: Normalized 21st Components
normalized21st.subtitle: Integration staging
normalized21st.description: Preview and validate 21st.dev components after normalization to the Güzel Invest design system.
normalized21st.note: Internal review only. Components must be normalized before production use.

status.normalizedDesc: Matches light theme, orange palette, and typography.

queue.emptyDescription: Add a 21st component via the import rule to see it here.

preview.title: Preview Surface
preview.description: Use this area to render the real component with sample data.

guidelines.item1: No dark mode classes; light theme only.
guidelines.item2: Replace non-brand colors with the orange palette.
guidelines.item3: Avoid global CSS and keep styles scoped.

homepage.title: Beautiful Projects for
homepage.subtitle: A trusted real estate platform in Alanya since 2001. We are by your side with properties for sale, rent, and professional consultancy services.
homepage.service1Desc: Reach your dream property with our portfolio of villas, apartments, land, and commercial properties.
homepage.service2Desc: Make the right decisions with location analysis, market data, and personalized investment strategies.
homepage.service3Desc: We offer solutions to your needs with apartments, land, and project-based property acquisition services.
homepage.service4Desc: We manage your Turkish citizenship application process end-to-end through real estate investment.
homepage.service5Desc: We professionally manage your property with rental, maintenance, dues tracking, and tenant management.
homepage.service6Desc: We provide expert guidance in title deed procedures, tax consultancy, and legal processes.

footer.slogan: Beautiful projects for a beautiful city

meta.title: Güzel Invest | Недвижимость в Алании
meta.description: Виллы, квартиры и участки на продажу в Алании. Надежное агентство недвижимости с 2001 года.
